title: Bostitch Office Wall Mount Manual Pencil Sharpener, Tip Saver, 8 Hole Dial, 6X Longer Cutter Life, Vertical or Horizontal Mounting Black (MPS1-BLK)
description: This Bostitch manual pencil sharpener is a fresh take on a classic! Each unit features an oversized crank knob making it easy for kids to grip and use at home or at school. What makes this sharpener really special is its replaceable cutter. If the cutter ever becomes dull, just swap it out! Don't throw out the whole unit. We're all about saving time and money. Plus, our HHC2 dual cutter technology extends the life of cutter by 6x*. Tip Saver Technology shapes the perfect pencil tip and prevents over sharpening. This manual pencil sharpener has high capacity shavings tray to hold a high volume of pencil shavings. Remove it easily for quick cleaning. The easy rotate selector dial fits 8 pencil sizes, making this mechanical pencil sharpener great for schools. With a durable all-metal construction and die cast base, this sharpener is built to last. The hand crank sharpener can be wall mounted using included screws or attached to a tabletop.
